mapper.select:
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, ID_NUMBER FROM wb_user WHERE STATUS = 1
and (DISPLAY_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%') OR USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%'))
ORDER BY USER_NAME
${authSql}

SELECT wu.USER_ID, wu.USER_NAME, wu.DISPLAY_NAME, wu.ID_NUMBER FROM wb_user wu LEFT JOIN wb_person wp on wu.USER_ID = wp.USER_ID WHERE wu.STATUS = 1 AND (wp.DEPT_ID IN (${deptIds}) OR wu.USER_ID IN (${userIds}))
AND (wu.DISPLAY_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%') OR wu.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%'))
ORDER BY USER_NAME
${authSql}

SELECT wu.USER_ID AS userId, wu.USER_NAME AS userName, wu.DISPLAY_NAME AS displayName, wd.DEPT_ID AS deptId, wd.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, wd.DEPT_FULLNAME AS deptFullName FROM wb_person wp LEFT JOIN wb_user wu ON wp.USER_ID = wu.USER_ID LEFT JOIN wb_dept wd ON wd.DEPT_ID = wp.DEPT_ID WHERE wu.USER_NAME = #{empNo}
